title: Early Access
content:
working on it, but may not include it in Early Access.

Will all 5e classes be available at launch? How many will be in EA?

All classes from 5e Player's Handbook will be included at launch. In Early Access, you can play as a Cleric, Fighter, Ranger, Rogue, Warlock, or Wizard.

Will custom characters have Voice Acting?

Yes, you can choose a voice as part of character creation.

How will multiclassing work?

Multiclassing is not going to be available in Early Access at launch, but the devs are
